titleStmt.title: By the king. A proclamation for the careful custody and well ordering of the New River brought from Chadwell and Amwell to the north parts of the city of London.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: In the Savoy, printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker, printers to the Kings most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Whitehall the three and twentieth day of June, 1669.
